plot outline: The storyline beautifully portrays the pain, anguish and anger, all related to love, of a disturbed hero who is deserted by his lady love. It projects the emotions of a man who falls in love but is cheated by his lover who marries another man. This betrayal disturbs him to the core that he goes crazy and kidnaps the heroine to a place that nobody knows. Indian cinema is hardly without romance breezing through the storyline and there lots of real stories of lost love for various reasons.
